title: Chekhov/Bond/Francon: The Seagull interpreted by Alain Francon and Edward Bond.
abstract: Analysis of production of The Seagull (France, 1995), locating the production in the performance history of Chekhov in France and showing how director Alain Francon's interpretation is influenced by his work with playwright Edward Bond
